Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -31,9 +31,9 @@
             <input
               type="password "
               value={confirmPassword}
               onChange={(e) => setConfirmPassword(e.target.value)}
-              placeholder="Enter your full name"
+              placeholder="Enter your password again"
               className="w-full mb-4 px-2 py-2 text-sm rounded-xl bg-[#151515] placeholder-[#8C9092] border border-[#374151]"
             />
             <button className="w-full py-2 rounded-xl text-base text-white font-semibold bg-gradient-to-r from-secondary to-tertiary">
               Continue

Index: =================================================================== --- +++ @@ -17,9 +17,9 @@ className="mb-10" />

- SIGN UP + CREATE

- CREATE + CREATE A PASSWORD

CREATE A PASSWORD

+

setConfirmPassword(e.target.value)}
